7.  Prüfer rings of Krull type
We note that if 4 is a Prüfer ring of Krull type and 6 " is a multiplicatively closed subset of A then Ajg is a Prüfer ring of Krull type. 
In [ 6 ] p.  95 it is shown that if ^ is a Prüfer ring then Ag is a Prüfer ring.  In [ 2 ] it is shown that if ^ is a ring of Krull type so is ^^. 
We also note that any finitely generated ideal in a Prüfer ring of Krull type may be generated by two elements.  This follows from Proposition 17 since in a Prüfer ring,  M == Mç for all fractionary ideals M,

We say that the family Й is a reinforced family of valuations if each valuation of Ü is reinforced on A. 
Proposition 25.  / / Ü is a family of finite character defining a Prüfer ring A then Ü is a reinforced family of valuations.
